1. AI pictures of Jesus on social media are suspiciously rugged — and we only have ourselves to blame  CNN
  2. Hot AI Jesus Is Huge on Facebook  The Atlantic

item.title: Microsoft's AI boss thinks it's perfectly okay to steal content if it's on the open web - The Verge
item.description:
1. Microsoft's AI boss thinks it's perfectly okay to steal content if it's on the open web  The Verge
  2. Has Microsoft’s AI Chief Just Made Windows Free?  Forbes
  3. The internet is not a free-for-all—we shouldn't let big tech companies wish copyright out of existence  PC Gamer
  4. Microsoft AI head Mustafa Suleyman says anyone can use information on internet to train their AI models for free  Business Today
  5. Microsoft AI CEO claims internet content is ‘freeware’ for AI training use  ReadWrite
